params.text: Wakikere yayagala okulaba emmunyeenye. Yayagala okubuuka azikwateko. Mu kiro kimu, yamalirira okukwata ku mmunyeenye!
Yawalampa olwazi olunene okuzituukako. Wabula yali tazituuka. Zaali wala NNYO!
Oluvannyuma, waggulu gye yalinnya, yalabayo akasozi. Yagolola omukono gwe, wabula era yali tazituuka.
Wakikere yalaba omuti gw’ebinazi okumpi awo. Gwali muwanvu nnyo. Ah, yalowoza nti omulundi guno kino kinaakola.
Yatandika okulinnya omuti. Mu kukaluubirizibwa okungi.
Yagolola emikono gye… wabula emmunyeenye yali era tazituuka.
Yasaalirwa nnyo. Yatunula wansi. Yewuunya nnyo nga tamanyi kya kuzzaako.
Yateeka omukono gwe mu kifuba ne yeegamba, “Sijja kutya. Nsobola okukikola!”
Oluvannyuma yalaba ekidiba. Emmunyeenye zaali zimyamyansiza mu mazzi.
Yeekaliriza emmunyeenye era n’asanyuka nnyo. Yebbika mu kidiba.
Gye yakoma okusemberera ekidiba, n’emmunyeenye.
Yawuga mu mazzi!
Yagavaamu era n’atuula ku lubalama.
Yatuula n’alaba emmunyeenye nga zimyamyanziza mu kidiba.

“Wakikere ayagala okumyamyansa” credits

This work, “Wakikere ayagala okumyamyansa” is a derivative of Frog's Starry Wish is translated by Alisha Berger. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2016. Based on Original story: by Sheesh Pal. © Room to Read , 2016. Some rights reserved.

“Wakikere ayagala okumyamyansa” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

 

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
